qas.question: On what date did the league announce its schedule for 2016?
How many teams are active in the AFL for 2016?
How many regular season games will each team play in 2016?
How many weeks will the 2016 regular season last?
On the weekend of what holiday will all teams have a bye?

context: The league's 20<a2_0>16<a2_0/> schedule, announced on the league's website on <a0_0>December 10, 2015<a0_0/>, shows an <a1_0>eight<a1_0/>-team league playing a 16-game regular season over <a3_0>18<a3_0/> weeks, with two bye weeks for each team, one on a rotational basis and the other a "universal bye" for all teams during the <a4_0>Independence Day<a4_0/> weekend, the first weekend in July. All teams will qualify for the postseason, meaning that the regular season will serve only to establish seeding.
